Class javachart.chart.HorizHiLoBarChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.BarChart
                   |
                   +----javachart.chart.HorizHiLoBarChart
public class HorizHiLoBarChart
extends BarChart
A derivative of conventional column charts that draws hi-lo bars using the y and y2 values from each Datum to determine the top and bottom of each bar. Multiple datasets are clustered side-by-side. This class also uses a HiLoAxis, which calculates a starting point for the axis scale based on the minimum y2 values
See Also:
BarChart, HiLoAxis, HorizHiLoBar
